dmca.title: [EV1-C1708118C] DMCA NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT http://www.voidsecurity.c
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----

MIME element (text/plain)
To Whom It May Concern, 
 
Re: http://www.voidsecurity.com/ 
 
It has come to our attention that a web site hosted on your network is
virtually an exact duplicate of our web site's content at
http://www.PlatinumServerManagement.com 
 
We have already notified the email address as listed on the web site
and/or the whois of the offending web site, and allowed several days for
a response to no avail. 
 
We do not allow anyone, including but not limited to current customers,
past customers, resellers, affiliates, anonymous resellers, etcetera,
without explicit written consent to copy our web site in whole or part. 
To date, we have not given any web site such written consent to copy our
web site in whole or part. 
 
All content on our web site, platinumservermanagement.com, is unique and
original content which was created by and/or specifically created for
Platinum Server Management, Inc.. All pages have been copyrighted with
the United States Copyright Office. 
 
We kindly request your cooperation as soon as possible in having the
owner of the site remove any and all content that has been taken from
our site, including but not limited to text, graphics, etcetera. 
Also, any content that would create a likelihood of confusion must be
removed as well. 
 
Thanks again in advance for your cooperation in this matter. Please
respond when this has been completed. 
 
Thank you,
Platinum Server Management, Inc.
